response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, I believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its unparalleled value and benefits, I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $15,000. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 15000}
